item.title: leetCode[003]Two Sum
item.description: 本文主要包括leetCode题集里的两个题目，Two Sum1 和 Two Sum2 题目1： Two Sum 1 Given an array of integers, find two numbers such that they add up to a specific target number. The function twoSum should return indices of the two numbers such that they add up

item.title: leetCode[001]Maximum Product Subarray
item.description: 题目： Find the contiguous subarray within an array (containing at least one number) which has the largest product. For example, given the array [2,3,-2,4], the contiguous subarray [2,3] has the largest product = 6. 题意： 题目中给出一个（至少包含一个元素）整形数组，求一个子数组（元素
